com.conversor.model - package com.conversor.model
 
comboBox - Variable in class com.conversor.model.ConversorBase
Declaration of the comboBox without the initialization.
conversionLabel1 - Variable in class com.conversor.model.ConversorBase
The 1st label that shows the result of the conversion.
conversionLabel2 - Variable in class com.conversor.model.ConversorBase
The 2nd label that shows the result of the conversion, only used if two rows are as an output.
ConversorBase - Class in com.conversor.model
ConversorBase has all the components required to create a new Java Swing interface.
ConversorBase() - Constructor for class com.conversor.model.ConversorBase
The constructor starts initializing its own JFrame setting the DefaultCloseOperation, size of the window, if it can be resizable, the main Layout as a Grid, then initialize the attributes with the same font and a FlowLayout for every JPanel that it has, for the buttons the focusability is set on false and the location relative is set to null to perform the position where the window will apear.
ConversorDistancias - Class in com.conversor.model
ConversorMonedas adopts the basic attributes from ConversorBase and modifies the final size of the window while, at the same time implementes ActionListener.
ConversorDistancias() - Constructor for class com.conversor.model.ConversorDistancias
The Constructor uses the JComboBox with the previous static attribute, after this it will set the font of this (can't be set before because its null until is initialized).
ConversorMonedas - Class in com.conversor.model
ConversorMonedas adopts the basic attributes from ConversorBase and its configurations, at the same time implements ActionListener and ValorCambioMoneda.
ConversorMonedas() - Constructor for class com.conversor.model.ConversorMonedas
The Constructor uses the JComboBox with the previous static attribute, after this it will set the font of this (can't be set before because its null until is initialized).
ConversorTemperaturas - Class in com.conversor.model
ConversorTemperaturas adopts the basic attributes from ConversorBase and its configurations, at the same time implementes ActionListener.
ConversorTemperaturas() - Constructor for class com.conversor.model.ConversorTemperaturas
The Constructor uses the JComboBox with the previous static attribute, after this it will set the font of this (can't be set before because its null until is initialized).
convertir(String, int) - Method in interface com.conversor.interfaces.ValorCambioMoneda
This method expects to be implemented for the conversion of the currency using monto and option
convertir(String, int) - Method in class com.conversor.model.ConversorMonedas
Parses the monto in a double and multiplies with the corresponding value from the ValorCambioMoneda then the result uses this formula:
